round_best: Develop a dynamic adjustment protocol for multi-agent systems that incorporates a "metacognitive layer" where agents can assess and reevaluate their own performance and decisions in real time. This layer would use machine learning to predict potential failures or inefficiencies in the agents' strategies based on ongoing tasks and environmental feedback. The system would autonomously adjust individual agents' roles and responsibilities, allowing the entire framework to adaptively optimize its workflow and improve task execution under varying conditions.
